title: Social Activity Recommendations for Clients
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want ALFRED to recommend social activities based on my clients' interests so that I can facilitate their engagement and help prevent social isolation.

title: Facilitated Communication Channels for Caregivers
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want efficient communication tools within ALFRED so that I can easily stay in touch with my clients and their families, ensuring timely updates and coordination of care.

title: Event Notifications for Social Engagement Opportunities
summary: As a professional caregiver managing multiple elderly clients, I want to receive notifications about social engagement opportunities tailored to my clients' interests so that I can encourage their participation and help prevent social isolation.

title: User-Defined Preferences for Social Interactions
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want to customize social interaction preferences for my clients so that I can ensure they engage in activities that align with their interests and comfort levels, while maintaining clear communication with their families.

title: Integration with Community Resources for Social Activities
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want ALFRED to integrate with community resources for social activities so that I can easily identify and recommend engaging events for my clients, helping to prevent their social isolation.

title: Feedback Mechanism for User Satisfaction with Social Features
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want a feedback mechanism to assess the effectiveness of social features so that I can ensure my clients are engaged and connected with their families and friends.

title: Personalized Reminders for Social Engagements
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want ALFRED to provide personalized reminders for social engagements for my clients so that I can ensure they remain socially active and connected with their families and friends, while managing their care routines efficiently.

title: Support for Group Communication Features
summary: As a professional caregiver managing multiple elderly clients, I want to facilitate group communication between my clients and their family members so that I can ensure everyone is informed and involved in their care.

title: User Privacy Settings for Social Interactions
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want to manage the privacy settings of my clients' social interactions on ALFRED so that I can ensure their data is protected while facilitating communication with their families and healthcare providers.
